prompt_text: Write a short story about a robot learning to feel emotions.
Explain how photosynthesis works in simple terms.
Create a product description for a new smartphone with AI features.
Write a recipe for chocolate chip cookies.
Describe the main features of quantum computing.
Write a professional email requesting a meeting with a potential client.
Create a poem about the changing seasons.
Explain the concept of machine learning to a 10-year-old.
Write a review for an imaginary restaurant called 'The Digital Bistro'.
Create a short dialogue between two friends discussing their weekend plans.
